Bibliography

Bonds, Mark Evan. 2009. A History of Music in Western Culture, 3rd ed. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.

Hanslick, Eduard. The Beautiful in Music (1854).

Liszt, Franz. “Berlioz and His Harold Symphony” (1855).

Mendelssohn, Felix. “Letter to Marc-André Souchay” (15 October 1842).

Morrison, Charles D. 2009. “Music Listening as Music Making.” Journal of Aesthetic Education 43, no. 1: 77–91.
